subcategory.name: Avatars
subcategory.description: User avatar examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS avatar components to display user profile pictures and company logos individually or grouped in stacks. These components are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles.
